text: Yesterday, I walked into the store to see what they were selling. Saw a variety of authentic Vietnamese products and sauces. The shop keeper was very nice, explaining how to use the sauces. The shop is clean too. will be back if i need any vietnamese sauces
Great place for authentic Viet products 💯 lovely store owner as well 🤍
Love the variety here and the place is clean and tidy. Will come back here 👍🏻! Highly recommend
very diverse in Vietnamese products and staff is friendly and helpful! i feel like i’m at home when visiting the store as a vietnamese!
kind and helpful staff. As a Vietnamese myself, there is everything I need in the store ❤️. Thank u
